sections.heading: preference; violations; penalty
sections.text: Any person who violates sections 48-225 to 48-231 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor. Such person shall be prohibited from receiving any compensation from public funds until he or she complies with sections 48-225 to 48-231.SourceLaws 1969, c. 751, ยง 6, p. 2827

48-230.Veterans preference; violations; penalty.

Any person who violates sections 48-225 to 48-231 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor. Such person shall be prohibited from receiving any compensation from public funds until he or she complies with sections 48-225 to 48-231.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 751, ยง 6, p. 2827;Laws 1977, LB 40, ยง 279;Laws 2002, LB 722, ยง 1.
